channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WI

item.title: Report X-2024021514
item.description:
Report X-2024021514

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-29T18:14:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-20
  • City: MADISON
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: found the box in the hazmat cage damaged. DescribePack: The box is wet and corroded. Once opened, found that one of four plastic bottles has a broken cap and bad under cap seal. all the other bottles are covered in the damaged bottles contents. about 2 quarts has leaked out. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: All was put into a plastic spill bag lined black tote, and then into the cage.

item.title: Report X-2024021518
item.description:
Report X-2024021518

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-29T18:14:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-21
  • City: EAU CLAIRE
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Trailer 827981 from 532-MILW was opened roughly around 1:30. Container had been loaded upside down at back of trailer, and fell out when door of trailer was opened. Container had leaked in trailer, and was further damaged by hitting concrete floor. Paint began leaking profusely. DescribePack: Lid bent, side of container dented heavily enough to break seal on lid significantly. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Immediately turning container upright. Soaking up and covering spilled paint.

  • Hazmat Injuries: 0

  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found in the unload leaking and damaged. The drum was crushed. DescribePack: The drum has a few spots that are leaking at the top and bottom due to the dent. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: the drum was placed in a red tote for QA to inspect for proper damage

item.title: Report X-2024020629
item.description:
Report X-2024020629

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-23T18:13:34+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-25
  • City: EAU CLAIRE
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: X-2024020629, X-2024020630: SequenceEvent: improperly loaded Hazmat packages, they appeared to be stacked on top of each other, I was the one who opened the trailer because are switcher stated that the trailer had a funny smell to it. After opening the trailer, I mediately could see the damaged hazmat's actively leaking, I had are switcher pull the trailer out into the yard to air out, and after about 30 minutes I had him put the trailer back on the door, I then put on my PPE and used PH balancing powder to cover the effected spill area, after that I swept the powder up and let the trailer air out for another 30 minutes, after that I gave the go ahead to unload the trailer. DescribePack: improperly loaded Hazmat packages, they appeared to be stacked on top of each other, which caused them to fall over and start spilling due to the vented caps. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: As soon as it was safe to do so I put the hazmat's upright and brought them over to are Hazmat cage.

item.title: Report X-2024020661
item.description:
Report X-2024020661

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-23T18:13:34+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-25
  • City: MADISON
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: was told the box was found damaged and leaking. may have fallen off of a tugger cart. The hazmat cleanup team was called to clean up the spill. DescribePack: 1 of 4 glass bottles shattered and leaked out its corrosive and flammable contents. the other 3 bottles are undamaged just leaked on and soiled. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: liquid dry was put on the spill. the damaged bottle box and one damaged item were disposed of by the cleanup team.

item.title: Report X-2024020731
item.description:
Report X-2024020731

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-23T18:13:34+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-25
  • City: EAU CLAIRE
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package handlers were unloading a 53-foot trailer, and discovered this Hazmat tipped over on its side, they immediately notified the manager and the QA. DescribePack: there were two lids on the inner container the smaller second lid was not tightened all the way and the package started leaking, when it tipped over. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: After the package handlers made me aware of the package, I immediately put on gloves and put the package upright, I then put the package in a bin for transport and brough it down to are hazmat cage, i then use absorbent powder to clean up the liquid in the trailer.

item.title: Report X-2024020667
item.description:
Report X-2024020667

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-25
  • City: MADISON
  • State: WI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: the box was being unloaded and it had a loose cap on one plastic bottle and most of its contents has leaked out. DescribePack: the bottle was missing its cap and its contents leaked out. the bottom of the box is soaked. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The damaged box was put into a plastic spill bag lined tote.
